General.Name: Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co.,Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells industrial waste heat boilers, large and special material pressure vessels, and nuclear safety equipment. The company offers boiler products, such as high efficiency pulverized coal, CFB, CDQ heat recovery, non-ferrous heat recovery, blast furnace gas heat recovery, heating furnace heat recovery, BFG heat recovery, oil refining catalyst unit heat recovery, HG heat recovery, sulphuric acid plant waste heat, diesel engine heat recovery, Alkali recovery, sintering cooler waste heat, gas-fired, and coal gasifier waste heat boilers; and sludge incineration WHB and HRSG products, and oxygen converter flues. It also provides pressure vessels; nuclear power equipment, including reactor vessel internals barrel shells, heat exchangers, and circuit tanks; environmental products; and marine cryogenic products, as well as solid waste, wastewater, and other pollutants treatment and recycling services. In addition, the company exports its products to the United States, Europe, Japan, Africa, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co.,Ltd was founded in 1956 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

5.Name: Ms. Guo Yi  Zhang
